item.title: UK holds off joining Trump's Board of Peace over Putin concerns
item.description: Foreign Secretary Yvette Cooper says the Russian president has shown no commitment to peace in Ukraine.

item.title: What we know about Trump's 'framework of future deal' over Greenland
item.description: Denmark and Greenland have made it clear they will not relinquish sovereignty of the world's largest island.

item.title: Ex-intelligence officer accused of betraying Austria in Russia spying trial
item.description: Egisto Ott, 63, denies charges of handing over information to Russian agents.

item.title: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence
item.description: The opposition politician is accused of election violence in which at least seven people were killed.

item.title: Japan suspends world's largest nuclear plant hours after restart
item.description: The operator says reactor remains "stable" and has no "radioactive impact outside".
